title: Baby Carrier
description: three vertical attached panels with long triangular red side ties; top panel has geometric embroidery in browns, reds, green and beige; center batik panel has geometric design in blue, orange, beige with side pointed edging in red, blue, beige; solid black bottom panel; lined throughout in blue denim-like fabric
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
